title: The Kirk Cousins Scale of QB Competence
description:
Danny Heifetz and Steven Ruiz rank NFL quarterbacks based on if they're better, worse, or just about the same as Vikings quarterback Kirk Cousins.

Hosts: Danny Heifetz and Steven Ruiz
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Additional Production Supervision: Conor Nevins
